title: Intensive Short-Term Medical English Course (Mastering Medical English Communication)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental English communication skills and comprehension of basic medical terminology
context.additional_context: Learning design optimized for mobile environments for healthcare institution managers/leaders, featuring real-time video lectures + mobile-compatible materials.

learning_goals: Accurately comprehend medical English documents (medical records, reports, etc.) with at least 80% accuracy
Converse fluently in basic medical settings (patient interaction, peer communication) with 70% fluency
Utilize over 50 medical terminology appropriately in professional contexts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
